title: 怎么给某个组使用/manuadd
author: q88724653
txt_content: 怎么给某个组使用/manuadd xxx 组名啊

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content:
权限 groupmanager.manuadd 
注意玩家可能会把自己分配到管理/owner组哟~

replies.author: q88724653
replies.txt_content:
